text: Soni chilikati cha ŵandu pana ŵaakulitendelaga (isanamu kuŵa) milungu (jao) kunneka Allah, ni akwinonyelaga yaakatite pakunnonyela Allah, nambo ŵandu ŵakulupilile niŵali ŵakunnonyela Allah mwakupelenganya. Mwanti ŵandu ŵalitendele lupusowo angajione ndema jachakaioneje ilagasyo (akaiweni yakogoya kusyene), ligongo machili gosope gachiŵa ga Allah, soni Allah ni Jwaukali pakupeleka ilagasyo
